SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.scanners

Class ClamAVClient

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.scanners.ClamAVClient
public class ClamAVClient extends Object
ClamAV antivirus scanner client.

This class provides functionality to scan files and streams for viruses using the ClamAV antivirus engine through the capybara clamav-client library.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClamAVClient

      public ClamAVClient()
      Constructor with default host and port.

      Uses localhost:3310 which is the default for ClamAV daemon.

    • ClamAVClient

      public ClamAVClient(String host, int port)
      Constructor with specific host and port.
      Parameters:
      host - The ClamAV server host.
      port - The ClamAV server port.

  • Method Details

    • ping

      public boolean ping()
      Ping the ClamAV server to check if it's available.
      Returns:
      True if the server responded to ping, false otherwise.

    • getVersion

      public Optional<String> getVersion()
      Get the ClamAV server version.

    • isInfected

      public boolean isInfected(File file) throws IOException
      Check if a file contains viruses.
      Parameters:
      file - The file to scan.
      Returns:
      True if the file is infected, false if it's clean.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the file cannot be read.

    • isInfected

      public boolean isInfected(byte[] bytes)
      Check if a byte array contains viruses.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      True if the byte array is infected, false if it's clean.

    • processScanResult

      private boolean processScanResult(xyz.capybara.clamav.commands.scan.result.ScanResult result)
      Process a scan result to check for infections and log findings.
      Parameters:
      result - The scan result to process.
      Returns:
      True if the scan result indicates an infection, false otherwise.
